mapper.select: SELECT Idx , Title , Description , '' as PageUrl , '' as ImageUrl , UseYN , CreateId , now() as CreateDate , '' as UpdateId , now() as UpdateDate FROM tb_liveshop WHERE UseYN = 1 AND Idx > ((#{pageIndex} - 1) * #{pageSize}) ORDER BY Idx DESC LIMIT #{pageSize}
SELECT (#{pageIndex} + #{pageSize}) / 2 from tb_liveshop ORDER BY Idx LIMIT 1;
